name: Cyber Sharp Shooter
description:
Cyber Sharp Shooter is an original  game I developed as the final project of the online Coursera course Game Design and Development from Michigan State University.

Instructions

Waves of enemies are here to destroy you. Your goal is to take them down before they can take you down. You will encounter several types of enemies, so study them well so that their attacks don't take you by surprise.

Controls
  • Move - ASDW
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Mouse Button
  • Switch Gun - Space Bar
  • Heal - Z
  • Barrier - X
  • Nuke - C
  • Pause - Esc
